node.largeText: We partner with government to build resilient and respectful digital services.
node.smallText: Verdance is a public interest tech firm building digital services to improve outcomes for people.
Verdance is a new company bringing deep experience in civic tech and the private sector.
node.largeText: We help groups who deserve more from their government.
node.columnOneTitle: For unemployed folks who deserve a helping hand

columnOneBody.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Getting the unemployment benefits you’re entitled to can often add unneeded stress to already difficult times. We work to point the way forward towards a future where the process is streamlined and respectful.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

columnTwoBody.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Veterans filing healthcare or disability claims often wait unacceptably long to get the benefits they’ve earned with their service. We work to deeply understand policy nuances and carefully automate pieces of the process, to save days and months of wait time.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

node.columnThreeTitle: For constituents who deserve a transparent, thoughtful government

columnThreeBody.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"We work on data-centric projects - legislative, healthcare, human capital, and more- that let the government make better use of data to level up its capabilities and make informed, thoughtful decisions in critical areas.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}
